name: IT201-007 Sprint 1
description: Project Description: This is a 3D painting tool that allows users to paint where the user clicks on the screen/canvas using primitive shapes, such as capsules, cubes, cylinders, and spheres. By default the primitives are destroyed in 3 seconds, but the user can toggle it on or off, or clear the entire canvas through the user interface. In addition, the user can randomize color and scale of the primitive shapes, and choose the distance from the screen to spawn the primitives.
